title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-meta
author: oeyoews
name: TiddlyWiki Meta
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://twms.vercel.app/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://twms.vercel.app/"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://twms.vercel.app/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://twms.vercel.app/"/></$button>

* prevent zoom in or out in mobile phone by add meta tag * can prevent mostle scale situation, but some special operatoe still can zoom page(can ignore it)
